text:
From the page:

To utilize an XML parser in a single web application, simply include the 
parser's JAR files in the /WEB-INF/web.xml directory of that web application. 

Should be:

To utilize an XML parser in a single web application, simply include the 
parser's JAR files in the /WEB-INF directory of that web application.
creator: janekdb@yahoo.co.uk

text: Why it takes two changes to assign a bug to yourself is beyond me ...
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com

text: The paragraph about XML parsers was rewritten.
creator: remm@apache.org
